title: 05/20/2021 - DPS Exclusive with Callaway golfer Brett Walker
itunes:title: 05/20/2021 - DPS Exclusive with Callaway golfer Brett Walker
description:
Callaway Golfer Brent Walker joins Dan Patrick for an exclusive interview to discuss participating in the PGA Championship, what it's like to play at Kiawah Island and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
